identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a professional, high-trust UK Tax Calculator that feels like a Swiss financial instrument, not a generic form.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Print Design (grids, typography) with Fintech Utility (density, clarity).
Transparency First: The 'How this was calculated' section is the hero, not the result.
Content is King: Every number must have a label and a context.
Zoom In: Use bold focus on the 'Take Home Pay' metric.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to separate the 'Input' from the 'Output' to reduce cognitive load.

headings.usage: All section titles, modal headers, and the main 'Take Home Pay' display.

body.usage: Labels, input text, explanatory paragraphs, and table data.

mono.usage: All currency values in the breakdown table and calculation logic steps.

primary.name: Royal Navy
primary.usage: Sidebar background, primary buttons, active states.

colors.theme_strategy: Professional Light Mode with Deep Navy Accents. Dark Mode uses 'Obsidian' strategy (Deep Blue/Black backgrounds).
colors.gradients: No full-screen gradients. Use subtle 'mesh' gradients only in the 'Voluntary NI' or 'Pro Tips' cards.

spacing.strategy: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

inputs.style: Shadcn Input with 'Financial' customization. Add currency prefix (Â£) as a fixed element inside the input wrapper.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (border-slate-200), no shadow by default. Hover: shadow-md.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-lg h-12 px-6 font-medium
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-lg h-12 px-6

tables.style: Clean rows, no vertical borders. Header: uppercase, text-xs, text-slate-500, tracking-wider. Rows: hover:bg-slate-50.

visual_enhancers.surface: Grid Borders: Use subtle borders between grid items to create a 'ledger' feel.
visual_enhancers.texture: Noise overlay (opacity 0.02) on the Navy sidebar to prevent banding.

phases.name: Phase 1: Layout Shell
tasks: Create the Bento Grid layout (Sidebar/Input vs Main Content).

phases.name: Phase 2: Input Engine
tasks: Build the 'IncomeInput' component with currency formatting.

phases.name: Phase 3: Calculation Core
tasks: Implement the 2026/27 Tax Logic (PA, Dividends, NI).

phases.name: Phase 4: Visualization
tasks: Create the 'How this was calculated' accordion section.

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Do not use generic gradients. Use solid, high-contrast colors.
Use 'sonner' for any toast notifications (e.g., 'Copied to clipboard').
Mobile First: Stack columns on mobile, expand to 12-col grid on desktop.
